attributes.action: Give sixth form students the right to go to Friday prayer (Jummah).
attributes.background: Give sixth form students the right to go to Friday prayer (Jummah).On the basis that if there are available free study periods.

rejection.details:
If you're concerned about the policy of a particular school, you could complain to the headteacher or board of governors.

If you're in England, you can find out who the governors are here:

https://get-information-schools.service.gov.uk/?SelectedTab=Governors
